title: 'You Have been Disconnected. Please Check your internet Connection'
body:
So heres how it started:

I open my game in a good thrusday afternoon to play a game with the new championship skins i just baught,
i go into the client, click launch and then start up a _**ranked**_ game.
But, when i get into the loading screen, i see that i am stuck on 84 ms and after a few seconds, it tells me this:
'**You Have Been Disconnected. Please check your internet connection.'**

I click okay, and go back and try to reconnect, SAME PROBLEM.
I try atleast 15 times to reconnect, but same result.
I hade some friends that where playing with me and were really angry about me going afk, this problem should be fixed soon and may you unban me and im sure there are other people with this problem so please take a look into it and i begg you riot games to comment a solution.

Thanks,
**Dark**

replies.body: It's a bummer that your friends were angry, but I'd like to help get this fixed so you all can go back to playing together.  It sounds like your network is specifically having problems connecting to the game server.  I recommend using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this and find what's causing that block.  That should get you fixed up, but let me know if your issue persists.

**Update**

Problem persists again when i restarted my computer this morning, i guess maybe because of my slow internet or where i am currently (Egypt) Although i usually get 91-134 ms.

Thank you for taking the time to comment and help :)

P.S: How about building middle eastern servers (i know that might take a long while but trust me, you will get a fortune out of it as there are many many arabic/middile eastern players)

Thanking you once more
** Dark**
Today it suddenly started working perfectly without any problems, I did not do anything specific... Don't know whats that about.
